bio: Gerrod is an Alteration mage posing as a hunter. He is secretly a member of the Radiant Dark, which he attempts to conceal from everyone. Unlike illusion mages who seek to conceal their identity by pretending to be hunters, Gerrod takes the extra step of actually learning the craft and being competent at it.
name: Gerrod
notes: The listed IDs are for his Cliffside Retreat iteration, not his Radiant Dark iteration
